Class WindowEngineLauncher

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEngineLauncher, IDesktopEngineLauncher, IWindowEngineLauncher

    public class WindowEngineLauncher
extends DesktopEngineLauncher
implements IWindowEngineLauncher
    Default implementation of IWindowEngineLauncher.
